snippet: Dozens of police departments around the U.S. are amassing their own DNA databases to track criminals, a move critics say is a way around regulations governing state and national databases that restrict who can provide genetic samples and how long ...

headline.main: Trump, Offering No Evidence, Says Obama Tapped His Phones
headline.print_headline: With No Proof,Trump Claims Obama Tapped

lead_paragraph: Dozens of police departments around the U.S. are amassing their own DNA databases to track criminals, a move critics say is a way around regulations governing state and national databases that restrict who can provide genetic samples and how long that information is held.
